name: Project Robotto: Hack + S.L.A.S.H
description:
Project Robotto: Hack + S.L.A.S.H is a two player top-down 3D shooter, played in local co-op. It takes players through a futuristic adventure as they storm a cyberpunk-ish corporation’s headquarters, on a mission to retrieve a microchip. They must defeat hordes of robots and a final powerful boss character, using both their shooting abilities and hacking skills to get through them!

The game must be interpreted as the first level of what could hypothetically be a much longer and fuller experience, a full campaign to be experienced with a friend.

Note: This is a strictly two-player local co-op game, played with two controllers, either Xbox or Playstation.

A collaboration between Aisosa Ugiagbe and Louis Torres Tailfer, developed for the master's course in Games Design and Development at the NFTS. Other team members include our producer Karima Sammout Kanellopoulou, writer Matthew Dickie, voice actors Jess Nesling and Andrew Smith, and sound designers Carlos San Juan Juanchi and Diego Hernandez España Cadena.
